professional, and the creator of the Complete Traefik Training Course. Iâ€™m happy
to announce that theByte, in collaboration with Traefik Labs, has created a full
in-depth Traefik Training course. 

We created this course to help you get up to speed quickly configuring and
deploying Traefik. This course provides real-world examples, hands-on labs, and
guided lessons in order for you to fully immerse yourself with all the features
available with the Traefik Proxy. The aim of the course is to help you get up
and running with Traefik.

Maybe you are already familiar with Traefik or just getting started. The Traefik
Training course guides you through a tour of the available features, use cases,
and answers a lot of the "Why?" questions you may have.

Why Traefik Training?
Traefik is an amazing tool. Iâ€™ve been using it for over three years now and
immersed myself in the project as a contributorâ€”using it both for personal and
customer projects. However, I have received consistent feedback from customers
and users requesting a Traefik Training course to walk through configuration,
deployment, and operating Traefik and an explanation of why certain things
behave and configured. Â Based on the feedback we created the Traefik Training
course.

The Traefik documentation is a great place to start. The Traefik Training course
extends the documentation with a guided tour on how best to use Traefik to fully
understand the potential for your use case. 

What will you learn?
The Traefik Training course contains over 5 hours of lessons, 20+ hands-on labs,
and a ton of real-world experience from deploying the Traefik Proxy for
real-world projects built into the course. The course covers the background of
Traefik, Â getting started with Traefik, configuration, deployment, and Day 2
operations.
